item.title: Tech Talks Page Inauguration
item.description: WOHOOOO!!! ðŸŽ‰ Hi Everyone, the staff of Tech Talks community is glad to inaugurate the Official Tech Talks page!!!!!!! In this page as community member you can be aware of new events, read learning resources, blog posts and not just that! You can even create your own posts and add learning resources that you know. Thanks for being part of the community. ðŸ¤—

item.title: How to Add a Learning Resource
item.description: Hi! We’re so glad you want to contribute to the community by sharing your knowledge in a blog post, you’ll see how easy is ðŸ’—. Hugo Installation. First you need to install Hugo in your OS, Hugo is the static page generator that we are using, that’s why you need to install it. Installation process for Arch Linux: 1 sudo pacman -Syu hugo Installation process for Debian & Ubuntu: 1 sudo apt-get install hugo Installation process for Fedora: 1 sudo dnf install hugo Installation process for Windows (Chocolatey): 1 choco install hugo -confirm Installation process for macOS (Homebrew): 1 brew install hugo Clone the github repository.

item.title: How to Create a Post
item.description: Hi! We’re so glad you want to contribute to the community by sharing your knowledge in a blog post, you’ll see how easy is ðŸ’—. Hugo Installation. First you need to install Hugo in your OS, Hugo is the static page generator that we are using, that’s why you need to install it. Installation process for Arch Linux: 1 sudo pacman -Syu hugo Installation process for Debian & Ubuntu: 1 sudo apt-get install hugo Installation process for Fedora: 1 sudo dnf install hugo Installation process for Windows (Chocolatey): 1 choco install hugo -confirm Installation process for macOS (Homebrew): 1 brew install hugo Clone the github repository.
